channel.title: What's going on?
channel.description: I know atleast 10 people that have gotten reputation resets in the last 2 days, is this for fun or misuse of their reputation?

[quote=“The cook from runescape, post:23, topic:282796”]Who cares anyway… I’ve only been repped twice, both for two random posts I made.

I could easily get 200 by releasing a leeched delta source or posting a tutorial on how to make someone admin on your server, but it doesn’t mean anything.[/quote]
Nope, only members with 10 reputation would appreciate a leeched Delta source, and they can’t rep others.

item.title: What's going on?
item.dc:creator: @Square Square
item.description:
@Square wrote:

This to some of you might sound repetitive, but rep doesn’t mean reputation to this community. It either means on or more of the following:

-You made a server that mscp members thinks deserves to give rep for (not an accomplishment)
-You said something funny that mscp members thinks deserves rep (not an accomplishment)
-You made a revolution thread and stuck it to the man (not an accomplishment)
-You’re one of the elitists of mscp and people just randomly give you rep for telling them what a client.java is.
Not an accomplishment

What matters is your name and what you’ve done for the community. Over at mitb, anyone that wants to be a repwhore cant, because they all have below 15 rep. Wanna know why? Because those kinds of posters never post anything valuable anyways to get any rep. That is the secret behind the low rep giveout on mitb. Everyone that has rep gives it out moderately and deserves it in return. You all treat it as if you should get it for posting an lolcats picture.

And when I say your name is more important than your rep, it means that it’s better if people knew who you were via name rather than via rep. In the end, when you have 200 rep, its just like getting a smiley face sticker and nothing more.

Read full topic

item.title: What's going on?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:16, topic:282796”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=373695.msg2820527#msg2820527 date=1244575966]
Oh, I asked Niall.
[/quote]
I know that!

You missed my point,
Why did you get your reputation reset.
What caused it?

As I mentioned in my previous post I am not forcing you to disclose this.[/quote]
Oh, I was bored of 200, so I requested it.

Read full topic

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:13, topic:282796”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=373695.msg2820089#msg2820089 date=1244542678]
Because most members want reputation, but I requested a reset in reputation.
[/quote]
Judging from your signature I was not alone in curiosity but I asked why not how?
If you wish to keep that confidential then please do, but I am just wondering.

If you compare mitb to here you will notice that mitb only has 2 (maybe 3) have 200 rep (max) while this side of the forums has over 15 at least.[/quote]
Oh, I asked Niall.

Read full topic

item.title: What's going on?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

its because he wants to look ‘cool’ going against the system, it doesnt bother me having it under my name no matter what the number but its there and if i’ve got it i like to think i’ve deserved it unless some random idiots just click my rep button for the sheer entertainment factor. So just ignore it its a number fuckin deal with it, if you wanna add to someones e-penis go for it its practically admitting you like gay sex over the internet but whatever kick you get out of that is fine with me.

Read full topic
